pullrequest.title: Get plugin info with Ignition transport service

content.raw:
About the warning, did you try modifying the Ignition Msg block in `SearchForStuff.cmake` and removing the `include_directories(${IGNITION-MSGS_INCLUDE_DIRS})` from the main CMakeLists.txt? I don't even know why this is a warning and not an error if the compiler cannot find a header file. Just one thing to try at least.

```
#!c++

find_package(ignition-msgs0 0.4 QUIET)
if (NOT ignition-msgs0_FOUND)
  message(STATUS "Looking for ignition-msgs0-config.cmake - not found")
  BUILD_ERROR ("Missing: Ignition msgs0 library.")
else()
  message(STATUS "Looking for ignition-msgs0-config.cmake - found")
  include_directories(${IGNITION-MSGS_INCLUDE_DIRS})
  link_directories(${IGNITION-MSGS_LIBRARY_DIRS})
endif()
```
